definition: (used to modify 事情[shi4 qing5]) serious/grave
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: And when a committed Lock Person lives in the same building as a No Lock Person, things can heat up.
sentences.chinese: 當這兩種人碰巧住一棟樓裏，事情就大條了。

sentences.english: Certainly, in counting to there is some bigs in the nerve.
sentences.chinese: 當然，除了神經有些大條之外。

definition: to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
hard to deal with/hard to get along with
to argue/to reason with sb/to talk sense/to be reasonable
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
